name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Beauty of Seven Shades of Time

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The magical transformation of nature throughout different times of the day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This stunning background captures the magical transformation of nature throughout different times of the day. Each color strip symbolizes a unique moment, from the brilliant light of dawn, through the refreshing blues of midday, to the warm tones of sunset, and finally the deep shadows of night. The image not only reflects the changing light but also evokes a sense of the cycle and continuity of time.
